txt.en: Lúmar has asked you to search for signs of Igerna and speak to Nordach at Winbury.\n\nWinbury is in northern Pinnath Gelin.

'I must stay here to receive reports from the rest of my scouts. We are working hard alongside the Knights to ensure that the king's visit is untroubled. Will you go east to Winbury and speak with Nordach? He may have seen or spoken with Igerna!'
The vineyards of Pinnath Gelin are renowned for producing the finest wines and spirits. One of this year's delicate crops is playing host to a most unwelcome guest.
You should let Nordach know that you have helped to clear the Winbury vineyards of beetles.\n\nNordach is at Winbury.
'I must stay here to receive reports from the rest of my scouts. We are working hard alongside the Knights to ensure that the king's visit is untroubled.'
'Stay where you are! We don't need any more trouble here!'
TBD - 'Who are you? Have you come to help?'
